newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-DORTMUND MAY BE WITHOUT REUTER FOR AUXERRE MATCH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-DORTMUND MAY BE WITHOUT REUTER FOR AUXERRE MATCH.

text.p: German champions Borussia Dortmund may be without key defender Stefan Reuter for next week's European Cup quarter-final against Auxerre, the club said on Tuesday.
Reuter is suffering from a torn chest muscle that will definitely keep him out of Saturday's home league match against 1860 Munich.

Dortmund's hopes of getting Brazilian defender Julio Cesar back soon after a knee operation took a knock when he learned he would have to postpone his return to full training, planned for this week, for another 10 days.
